title: Double Feature Drive In The Dark Corner & I Wake Up Screaming

sources.title: Double Feature Drive In The Dark Corner I Wake Up Screaming
sources.description: Hot Dog (1930) NOT RATED - - Directed by Dave Fleischer Hot Dog is a 1930 animated short film which is presented by Max Fleischer and was also directed by Dave Fleischer. The film, which was originally released by Paramount Pictures, is the first cartoon to feature Bimbo, as he attempts to gain a lover during the film. The Dark Corner (1946) RATED PASSED - Directed by Henry Hathaway, with Lucille Ball , Clifton Webb , William Bendix A secretary tries to help her boss who's been framed for murder. I Wake Up Screaming (1941) RATED PASSED - Directed by H. Bruce Humberstone, with Betty Grable , Victor Mature , Carole Landis Why is Inspector Ed Cornell trying to railroad Frankie Christopher for the murder of model Vicky Lynn?
